content: **knitted jumper in drops alaska or drops big merino piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with raglan size xs xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #winteroceansweater drops design pattern x-511 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops alaska from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 600-650-750-800-900-950-1050 g colour 37 dark blue or use drops big merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 550-600-700-750-800-900-1000 g colour 17 navy blue **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
